SELECT od.*, com.company_name AS customerName FROM orders od INNER JOIN company com ON od.customer_code = com.company_code WHERE od.receive_or_place = '발주' AND delete_status = 'N' AND order_status IN ('저장', '확정')
AND (od.order_date >= #{startDate} OR od.due_date >= #{startDate} OR od.reg_date >= #{startDate} OR od.update_date >= #{startDate})
AND (od.order_date <= #{endDate} OR od.due_date <= #{endDate} OR od.reg_date <= #{endDate} OR od.update_date <= #{endDate})
AND (#{orderDate} IS NULL OR od.order_date = #{orderDate}) AND (#{customerCode} IS NULL OR od.customer_code = #{customerCode}) AND (#{orderEmpid} IS NULL OR od.order_empid = #{orderEmpid})
SELECT oddt.*, it.item_name AS item_name FROM orders_detail oddt INNER JOIN item it ON oddt.item_code = it.item_code WHERE oddt.order_detail_code = #{orderCode} ORDER BY oddt.sorder
